SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.socket.middleware

Class ClientSkeleton

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.socket.middleware.ClientSkeleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Remote
public class ClientSkeleton extends Object implements Client
Represents a skeleton implementation of the Client interface. It provides functionality for sending and receiving messages to/from the server.
